ygData.subject: Re: LJ and the quest for crook staff
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL Nagafen carries it.. good luck in getting it Mik  and the Crook does have awesome stats but one drawback... the random cast of
ygData.messageBody:
LOL
Nagafen carries it.. good luck in getting it Mik
<chuckles to himself>
and the Crook does have awesome stats but one drawback... the random cast of
earthquake is an AE spell that does sometimes draw unwanted company from
creatures nearby.... even creatures above or below you....
<bows>
